parse: Verb - Perfect Participle Middle or Passive - Genitive Masculine Singular
str2: To know beforehand, foreknow. From pro and ginosko; to know beforehand, i.e. Foresee.
From kataballo; a deposition, i.e. Founding; figuratively, conception.
Probably from the base of komizo; orderly arrangement, i.e. Decoration; by implication, the world (morally).
A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Passive - Genitive Masculine Singular
str2: To make clear (visible, manifest), make known. From phaneros; to render apparent.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Last, at the last, finally, till the end. A superlative probably from echo; farthest, final.
A space of time or interval; by extension, an individual opportunity; by implication, delay.
A primary preposition denoting the channel of an act; through.
